runways.note: It's technically possible to reset at 7 and keep the top layer of obstacle B intact by clipping through the blocks, but do we really need to represent that?

obstacles.name: Bomb Blocks
obstacles.note: The bomb blocks that separate the bottom right door from the main shaft

obstacles.name: Shot Blocks
obstacles.note: The shot blocks that separate the bottom door from the main shaft

to.note: FIXME there is certainly a possible speedball here depending on adjacent room

strats.name: Shoot the Blocks
strats.note: It's possible to mid-air morph into the morph tunnel.

strats.name: Power Bombs
note: It's possible to mid-air morph into the morph tunnel.
This is why no PBs are needed if the obstacle is already broken.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: No bombs needed on the premise that you can only get to 8 by breaking the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: From this direction, obstacle B is fully breakable with Power Beam

strats.name: Basement Speedball (Phantoon Alive)
strats.note: The speedball is more complicated because of the robot standing in the way.

strats.name: Basement Speedball (Phantoon Dead)
note: An easier version of the speedball, since you can push the robots all the way left.
It's even possible to setup the short hop mockball by bonking the center platform.

nodes.name: Map Station
nodes.note: Usually a map station isn't its own node, but this one has a lock it doesn't share with the door.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The item doesn't spawn until Phantoon is defeated.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The enemies are killable using Power Beam, once they actually spawn.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The enemies are killable using Power Beam, once they actually spawn.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The enemies are killable using Power Beam, once they actually spawn.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The item doesn't spawn until Phantoon is defeated.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The item doesn't spawn until Phantoon is defeated.

strats.name: 2-hit Bowling
strats.note: This is doable even without any momentum from a previous room, but pretty tight.

strats.name: Shinespark
note: Should we have this one if you're not assumed to know the layout? You can't go out of the room to set it up once you see what room it is.
But then again, it'd be a softlock either way if you have no way through.

to.note: It's one-way because there's no logical reason to go to the statue and back out to the door.

strats.name: Bomb the blocks
strats.note: If using PBs, doable with just one by placing it far enough right.

strats.name: Wave Screw
strats.note: The shot blocks can be broken with Wave by scrolling the screen right then coming back out of the tunnel and walking right.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Those bomb blocks respawn. They must be broken on the way back too.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: No requirements, on the basis that the PB blocks must be destroyed to reach node 5 in the first place

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The item doesn't spawn until Phantoon is defeated.

runways.note: The actual length is 4.5. Got halfwidth blocks

strats.name: Base
strats.note: The path can't be passed unless the Workrobot is activated (so Phantoon dead)

strats.name: Base
note: The path can't be passed unless the Workrobot is activated (so Phantoon dead)
Thid doesn't require breaking the bomb blocks on the premise that you can't here without breaking them.

strats.name: Bomb Jump
strats.note: Could be a notable strat, but it already has its own tech.

strats.name: Exterior Speedjump
strats.note: A bit finicky for shorter runways, but exactly 3 tiles works.

strats.name: Sponge Bath In-Room Speedjump
strats.note: It doesn't work from flush against the door. Start moving about half a tile away from it.

strats.name: Naked Spiky Death Room (Left to Right)
Morph
strats.note: The room is considerably more forgiving with Morph, so this is there as an alternate strat.

strats.name: Naked Spiky Death Room (Right to Left)
Morph
strats.note: The room is considerably more forgiving with Morph, so this is there as an alternate strat.

runways.note: Actual length is 3.5. Got halfwidth blocks.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The item doesn't spawn until Phantoon is defeated.

enemies.name: Skultera
enemies.note: Drops can be reached for free using the platforms

strats.name: Wrecked Ship E-Tank Platforming
strats.note: This can be kind of tricky, so it's a notable strat and we have alternate strats.

strats.name: Wrecked Ship E-Tank Spring Ball Bounce
note: From a standstill at the door, jump just before the first stept.
Mid-air mockball and bounce on the first platform.
This should bounce on the third platform and get to the item.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: No alternate strat since the only tricky jump is easy on the way back.

runways.note: This runway is actually 9 tiles long but got 5 speedblocks, leaving a buffer.

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The item doesn't spawn until Phantoon is defeated.

nodes.name: Save station
nodes.note: Usually a save station isn't its own node, but this one has a lock it doesn't share with the door.
